name: T2: The Arcade Game
overview: The #1 arcade "shooter" of all time explodes onto Super NES! You're a T-800 terminator armed with rapid-fire machine guns, plasma pulse rifles, shotguns, guided missiles and M-79 grenade launchers! Blast armies of endoskeletons! Destroy missile-firing HK's! Terminate the liquid metal T-1000... or be TERMINATED!
